preprocessed-images.name: Use cached textures
preprocessed-images.description: Use cached textures for loading, may significantly decrease loading time on lower-end devices.

preload-mod-tex.name: Preload mod images
preload-mod-tex.description: Preload separate textures of other mods at loading (usually only spritesheets are loaded at launch).

mt-playlayer.name: Multi-threaded level rendering
mt-playlayer.description: Force the game to utilize all CPU cores while playing a level.

max-threads.name: Max threads
max-threads.description:
Maximum amount to threads to use when loading/rendering.
(1 core = 2 threads)
